justification: Vendor 1 demonstrates support for real-time, high-quality 3D rendering with Unity, Unreal, and other engines and mentions 'enabling real-time rendering of complex scenes' and 'high-fidelity 3D model visualization.' However, the offering only indirectly addresses creating fully immersive virtual worlds or highly interactive experiences. There is no explicit mention of 'digital twins,' 'metaverse,' or specific features related to interactivity and user engagement beyond visualization and streaming.
ability: The ability to create immersive virtual worlds and interactive experiences with gaming engine technology
